What'll you learn?

Your kids will learn basic and fundamental of coding by using Game-based learning.Kids will learn to create their own games using block-based programming method.Kids will get their first experience in writing lines of code, and directly build and present their projects.

Frequently asked question

> Currently, we only offer online classes with flexible times. Coding classes will be conducted through Google Meet.

> Laptop with webcam, stable internet connection, and Google Mail (Gmail) account.

> Don't worry, parents, you can have a free consultation with our student advisors! We are happy to help parents find suitable classes for your children.

> Yes, you can, Parents. You can set up a schedule with our student advisors! We are happy to help you find a schedule that works for your child.

About us

Hi parents, we are a coding course for kids that will help your kids learn coding in a fun way. Our goal is to make your kids love coding and provide the best learning sessions for your kids. Our mentor have been teaching coding for kids around the world for more than 5 years.

Our students are from these schools:

Coding kids!

We help your children to express and unlock their true potential in the digital world, with a structured curriculum and experienced coding mentors.
